subject: Re: [junit] java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError
msgSnippet: The JUnit test runner cannot read your mind. :) You must specify the fully-qualified class name of the test case class to run. *********** REPLY SEPARATOR
messageBody:
The JUnit test runner cannot read your mind. :) You must specify the
fully-qualified class name of the test case class to run.

*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

On 2002-07-05 at 21:19 Divaharan wrote:

>Hi,
>
>I was wondering if someone could help resolve this error. when I run
>the AllTests class from the root directory I get the following error
>message. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
>AllTests (wrong name: junit/samples/AllTests). But it works find when
>I give the whole path junit.samples.AllTests.
>
>I did include the /junit/samples/ directory in the CLASSPATH.

Don't do this; it won't help. Perhaps you should read a tutorial on
Java and classpaths.

J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
